00028 #ifndef LINEARSPRINGWITHVARIABLESPRINGCONSTANTSFORCE_HPP
00029 #define LINEARSPRINGWITHVARIABLESPRINGCONSTANTSFORCE_HPP
00030 
00031 #include "GeneralisedLinearSpringForce.hpp"
00032 
00033 #include <boost/serialization/access.hpp>
00034 #include <boost/serialization/base_object.hpp>
00035 
00039 template<unsigned DIM>
00040 class LinearSpringWithVariableSpringConstantsForce : public GeneralisedLinearSpringForce<DIM>
00041 {
00042     friend class TestForces;
00043     
00044 private :
00045 
00047     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00054     template<class Archive>
00055     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00056     {
00057         // If Archive is an output archive, then '&' resolves to '<<'
00058         // If Archive is an input archive, then '&' resolves to '>>'
00059         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<GeneralisedLinearSpringForce<DIM> >(*this);
00060         archive & mUseEdgeBasedSpringConstant;
00061         archive & mUseMutantSprings;
00062         archive & mMutantMutantMultiplier;
00063         archive & mNormalMutantMultiplier;
00064         archive & mUseBCatSprings;
00065         archive & mUseApoptoticSprings;
00066     }
00067 
00068 protected :
00069     
00071     bool mUseEdgeBasedSpringConstant;
00072 
00074     bool mUseMutantSprings;
00075 
00077     double mMutantMutantMultiplier;
00078 
00080     double mNormalMutantMultiplier;
00081 
00083     bool mUseBCatSprings;
00084 
00086     bool mUseApoptoticSprings;
00087 
00088 public :
00089 
00093     LinearSpringWithVariableSpringConstantsForce();
00094     
00098     ~LinearSpringWithVariableSpringConstantsForce();
00099 
00105     void SetEdgeBasedSpringConstant(bool useEdgeBasedSpringConstant);
00106 
00115     void SetMutantSprings(bool useMutantSprings, double mutantMutantMultiplier=2, double normalMutantMultiplier=1.5);
00116 
00122     void SetBetaCateninSprings(bool useBCatSprings);
00123 
00129     void SetApoptoticSprings(bool useApoptoticSprings);    
00130 
00144     double VariableSpringConstantMultiplicationFactor(unsigned nodeAGlobalIndex, 
00145                                                       unsigned nodeBGlobalIndex, 
00146                                                       AbstractTissue<DIM>& rTissue, 
00147                                                       bool isCloserThanRestLength);
00148     
00155     void AddForceContribution(std::vector<c_vector<double, DIM> >& rForces,
00156                               AbstractTissue<DIM>& rTissue);
00157  
00158 };
00159 
00160 #include "TemplatedExport.hpp"
00161 
00162 EXPORT_TEMPLATE_CLASS_SAME_DIMS(LinearSpringWithVariableSpringConstantsForce)
